docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is currently in development and is not the default version. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or entering api/v2/ in the URL.

resources.name: Parameters
resources.full_description: These API calls are related to nested parameters for host, domain, hostgroup, operating system. If you are looking for global parameters, go to this link.
